summary: The relationship of a young successful couple expecting a baby is put to the test after the traumatic experience Maria has endured. Her husband Tomek wants to seek revenge but doesn't know who is to blame.
cast: Marcin Dorocinski|Julia Kijowska|Adam Woronowicz|Agata Kulesza|Dorota Kolak|Marian Dziedziel|Wojciech Mecwaldowski|Roman Gancarczyk|Piotr Trojan|Magdalena Czerwinska|Monika Pikula|Mariusz Pilawski|Joanna Sydor|Justyna Kacprzycka|Dagmara Bak|Dawid Czuprynski|Grzegorz Ciagardlak|Maria Czykwin|Slawomir Doliniec|Michal Zerucha
keywords: rape|town hall|mayor|married couple|sex with a pregnant woman
title: Milosc
